description: The Takakura household is made up of Shoma and Kanba, two twin brothers, and their younger sister Himari. Himari has been diagnosed with an incurable disease, and her doctor has determined that she does not have long to live. A few days after hearing this news, Shoma and Kanba decide to take Himari for a visit to one of her favorite places - the local aquarium. But while there, Himari catches a glance of a strange penguin...
